songs.title: Barbie Jeep
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Is it too hot to dance?
No, we rock steady
Is it too hot to dance?
No, we rock steady
Is it too hot to dance?
No, we rock steady
Rock steady, rock
You know we rock steady

[Chorus]
I can be your Nancy, and you can be my Sid
Baby, I've been sittin' fancy and I've been sittin' pretty
I don't really want your hands in my general vicinity
But if you wanna say we're dan-dancing, I'll let you say we did
Be your Nancy, and you can be my Sid
Baby, I've been sittin' fancy and I've been sittin' pretty
I don't really want your hands in my general vicinity
But if you wanna save a dan-dance...

[Verse 1]
The club is full of animals
It's like I'm walking through the zoo
I see you drooling, boo
You're Scooby-Doo
And the booties that's moving on you is human food
You're rubbing every butt in the room
You think it's your duty to
I'm not even tryna be rude to you
I'll be courteous and word it all nicely when I say "Move it dude!"
Follow me into the crowd, I got you scootin' through
I get black and blue, little daddy what a bruiser do

[Chorus]
Be your Nancy, and you can be my Sid
Baby, I've been sittin' fancy and I've been sittin' pretty
I don't really want your hands in my general vicinity
But if you wanna say we're dan-dancing, I'll let you say we did
(You know I can't dance, you know I can't dance)
Baby, I've been sittin' fancy and I've been sittin' pretty
(But you want me to)
I don't really want your hands in my general vicinity
(You know I can't dance, can't dance, can't dance)
But if you wanna save a dan-dance...

[Verse 2]
You wanna bump and grind? I can tell you're having trouble
The struggle is real, and you wanna feel up on my stubble
You're gonna pop my bubble, you muggle
Pretend to stumble any closer
I'll send you up in the air: wingardium leviosa
Wanna boast about it? On the other hand
If you wanna look close to me, do the hover hand
And tell your brothers whatever, honey, I'll understand
You're just another "whatever", you're just another fan

[Bridge]
Is it too hot to dance?
No, we rock steady
Is it too hot to dance?
No, we rock steady
Is it too hot to dance?
No, we rock steady
And I'm light on my feet 'cause I'm not top heavy

[Chorus]
I can be your Nancy, and you can be my Sid
Baby, I've been sittin' fancy and I've been sittin' pretty
I don't really want your hands in my general vicinity
But if you wanna say we're dan-dancing, I'll let you say we did
You know I can't dance, you know I can't dance
But you want me to
You know I can't dance, I can't dance
You know I can't dance, but I'll dance
And I'll dance and we'll dance
You can be my Sid
Baby, I've been sittin' fancy and I've been sittin' pretty
I don't really want your hands in my general vicinity
But if you wanna save a dan-dance
